data.name: Gadgeteer
data.detailed_description:
Gadgeteer Beta Demo is NOW AVAILABLE

Play the game for free & win prizes!
Learn more @ http://www.gadgeteergame.com/beta


About the Game

Note: If you see a blank screen after initiating the download, hit 'ENTER' to proceed. We're currently fixing the issue with Steam.

—

Gadgeteer is a physics-based VR puzzle game where you build chain reaction machines to solve fun, intricate puzzles. Your machines will use gadgets to launch, bump, twist, and turn—creating chain reactions that may even end up tearing apart the fabric of space-time.

Prepare your wits because you'll need them to build your masterpiece!

Puzzle / Story Mode
Uncover the mystery behind the disappearance of a brilliant mad scientist. Where did he go? What was he building? And why was he so secretive about it? Solve the puzzles he's left for you to build what he's built and explore a world of infinite possibilities.

Sandbox Mode
Build your dream machine without any rules but the rules of physics. When you're done, share your masterpiece or experience the engineering marvels of others.

data.short_description: Gadgeteer is a physics-based VR puzzle game where you build chain reaction machines to solve fun, intricate puzzles. Your machines will use gadgets to launch, bump, twist, and turn—creating chain reactions that may even end up tearing apart the fabric of space-time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-4790K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
